skills.name: Hemorrhage
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Generate Essence:</text> <text class='c_resource'>9</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>35%</text></br>Burst an enemy's blood, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.27 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage. <text class='c_important'>Hemorrhage</text> has a <text class='c_number'>20%</text> chance to form a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.

skills.name: Blood Surge
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Essence Cost: </text><text class='c_resource'>30</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>12%</text></br>Draw blood from enemies, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.2 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage, and expel a blood nova, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.5 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage. <text class='c_important'>Blood Surge's</text> nova damage is increased by <text class='c_number'>10%</text> per enemy drained, up to <text class='c_number'>50%</text>.

skills.name: Raise Skeleton
skills.desc: Raise a Skeleton from a Corpse to fight for you.</br></br>Once all of your Skeletons have been summoned, Raise Skeleton briefly summons a <text class='c_important'>Skeletal Priest</text> to empower your Minions for <text class='c_number'>5</text> seconds, increasing their damage by <text class='c_number'>30%</text> and healing them for <text class='c_number'>15%</text> of their Maximum Life.

equipment.name: Warlord Greathelm
added_affixes: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> absorbing up to <text class='c_random'>1.34</text> damage for <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>30</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Ring
base_affixes: +0.02 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently
added_affixes: Deal <text class='c_random'>8.92%</text> increased damage for each second you stand still, up to <text class='c_number'>30%</text>.

equipment.name: Kite Shield
base_affixes: +0.02 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently

equipment.name: Adventurer's Tunic
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grant <text class='c_number'>20%</text> Damage Reduction for <text class='c_random'>5.13</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Serpent's Bite
base_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>44.58%</text> of normal damage.

equipment.name: Boneweave Gauntlets
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>26.75%</text> Attack Speed.

equipment.name: Chain
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>0.45%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>26.75%</text>.

equipment.name: Ring
base_affixes: +0.02 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> leaves a trail that lasts for <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds and deals <text class='c_random'>0.29</text> Shadow damage per second to enemies who stand in it. Your Movement Speed is no longer reduced while <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> is active.
added_affixes: Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>17.84%</text> increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.
